    • Method Detail

      • getListOfActivePcs

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getListOfActivePcs(java.lang.String listOfPcsFile)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method checks the ssh connexion to all the pcs whitin the Telecom ParisTech's computer park. from the file named *pcsFilePath*, we send an ssh request "echo $((1))" for each computer in the room, and we update our Dictionary of active pcs for each computer that sent an answer. As we can see for the latest version, we use also threads to have a better execution timer for this part.
        Parameters:
        listOfPcsFile - is the name of file which contains the list of pcs to consider as slaves
        Returns:
        listOfActivePcs is the Dictionary of active pcs within the room
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if we can't reach or open the listOfPcsFile
        java.lang.InterruptedException - as for the interrupted threads that search for active pcs

      • splitOnUmx

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> splitOnUmx(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listOfActivePcs,
                                                                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> SxDictionnary)
                                                                                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method splits all the Sx files to UMx files using threads on slaves. Sx files are created by the master directly by spliting the original file by lines or block of lines (see the splitSx an the splitSxBlock methods in the ShavadoopUtils class for more details). The purpose here to get the "Map" part of the MapReduce pattern. For each word in the Sxfiles, we put an occurence of "1" in the corresponding Umx File. The reducing part is done later on the UmxtoSmx part.
        Parameters:
        listOfActivePcs - is the dictionnay of active pcs on the room, we get if from the getListOfActivePcs() method
        SxDictionary - is the dictionnay of all the Sx files we get from the SplitSx methods
        Returns:
        UmxDictionnay which is a Dictionary of (keys = UmxFiles) and (Entries = words whithin the corresponding UmxFile)
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if we get an interrupted thread on the join of threads of slaves

      • splitOnSmXAndRmx

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> splitOnSmXAndRmx(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> wordsDictionnary,
                                                                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listOfActivePcs)
                                                                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method does the "reducing" part on the MapReduce algorithm. We take all our Umx Files that we created on the "Map" phase, and we shuffle each word on the Umx files to regroup them on the Smx files. The Smx files contains only one word repeated as many time as it appears in the Umx file with its occurence being conserved.
        Parameters:
        wordsDictionary - is the Dictionary of words and their respective Umx file where they appear. We get this Dictionary by converting the UmxDictionary obtained in the Map phase and using the function convertUmxDictToWordsDict on the ShavadoopUtils Class
        listOfActivePcs - as seen before..
        Returns:
        RmxDictionary is the Dictionary of RmxFiles, after the shuffle and reducing phase
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - is the slave threads are interrupted

      • runOnSlaves

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> runOnSlaves(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> SxDictionnary)
                                                                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function runs all the precedent methods. It is launched on the main part for the master
        Parameters:
        SxDictionary - is the list of Sx Files after the initial split
        Returns:
        wordsDictionnary which is the final reduced dictionary
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case we can't load the Input file
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in case the threads we start are interrupted
